short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the functionality of your Trackerbot account!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are your running a manual eBay dropshipping store? Trackerbot semi-automatic mode will help you upload multiple tracking numbers to eBay with one click. For further details and instructions on how to set up, please go to www.trackerbot.me/semiauto.

Features:
- Non-API tracking numbers upload to eBay
- Bluecare Express integration 
- Supports over 40 retailers
- Detailed dashboard with shipping information
- Super easy to set up!
